languages.text: An attack that hits enemy at a distance of 2 or more cells from the Arbirtator, applies Can't attack condition for 1 round on the that enemy if they fails WP test (difficulty -{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} ). If attack hits several enemies, this effect applies to the closest enemy to the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: An attack that hits enemy at a distance of 2 or more cells from the Arbirtator, applies Can't attack condition for 1 round on the that enemy if they fails WP test (difficulty -{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} ). If attack hits several enemies, this effect applies to the closest enemy to the Arbitrator.

languages.text: Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.
languages.original_text: Когда арбитр совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по врагу на расстоянии 2 клеток или больше, этот враг выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} и в случае провала получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Если атака попала по нескольким врагам, эффект применяется к врагу, ближайшему к арбитру.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Arbitrator hits an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or father, that enemy must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the cannot attack effect for 1 round. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

languages.text: Yargıcı, bir düşmana en az 2 hücrelik bir mesafeden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} o düşman, −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramama{/g} etkisine maruz kalır. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Yargıcı'nın saldırısı birden çok düşmana vurursa bu etki, Yargıcı'nın en yakınındaki düşmana uygulanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı, bir düşmana en az 2 hücrelik bir mesafeden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} o düşman, −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramama{/g} etkisine maruz kalır. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Yargıcı'nın saldırısı birden çok düşmana vurursa bu etki, Yargıcı'nın en yakınındaki düşmana uygulanır.

languages.text: Cada vez que el Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} a un enemigo desde una distancia mínima de 2 casillas, ese enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} o sufrirá el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si el ataque del Arbitrator impacta a varios enemigos, este efecto se aplica al que tenga más cerca.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} a un enemigo desde una distancia mínima de 2 casillas, ese enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} o sufrirá el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si el ataque del Arbitrator impacta a varios enemigos, este efecto se aplica al que tenga más cerca.

languages.text: 当法务官{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}距离2格或更远的敌人时，被命中的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17}减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果法务官的攻击命中多名敌人，则离法务官最近的敌人受此效果影响。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: 当法务官{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}距离2格或更远的敌人时，被命中的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17}减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果法务官的攻击命中多名敌人，则离法务官最近的敌人受此效果影响。

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi à une distance minimale de 2 cases, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17}, sans quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Si l'arbitrator touche plusieurs ennemis, l'effet s'applique au plus proche.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi à une distance minimale de 2 cases, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17}, sans quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Si l'arbitrator touche plusieurs ennemis, l'effet s'applique au plus proche.

languages.text: アービトレイターが2セル以上の距離の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃する{/g}と、その敵は-{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}となる。アービトレイターの攻撃が複数の敵に当たる場合は、この効果はアービトレイターに最も近い敵に適用される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターが2セル以上の距離の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃する{/g}と、その敵は-{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}となる。アービトレイターの攻撃が複数の敵に当たる場合は、この効果はアービトレイターに最も近い敵に適用される。

languages.text: Wenn der Arbitrator einen Gegner aus einer Entfernung von 2 oder mehr Feldern {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, muss dieser Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang mit dem Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Kann nicht angreifen{/g} belegt zu werden. Trifft der Angriff des Arbitrators mehrere Gegner, wird der Gegner, der dem Arbitrator am nächsten steht, mit dem Effekt belegt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy from a distance of 2 cells or further, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} penalty or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the Arbitrator's attack hits multiple enemies, this effect is applied to the enemy closest to the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Arbitrator einen Gegner aus einer Entfernung von 2 oder mehr Feldern {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, muss dieser Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang mit dem Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Kann nicht angreifen{/g} belegt zu werden. Trifft der Angriff des Arbitrators mehrere Gegner, wird der Gegner, der dem Arbitrator am nächsten steht, mit dem Effekt belegt.

languages.text: Когда арбитр совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по врагу на расстоянии 2 клеток или больше, этот враг выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} и в случае провала получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Если атака попала по нескольким врагам, эффект применяется к врагу, ближайшему к арбитру.

Когда арбитр совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по врагу на расстоянии 2 клеток или больше, этот враг выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Damage|2ec8e80ae4184b409a3d242fcaf0db17} и в случае провала получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
